summary: WILL I WAS STOPPED WITH THE TRANSMISSION IN PARK, THE J-71 AUTOPARK  AUTOMATIC PARKING BRAKE ON MY MOTORHOME FAILED IN THE LOCKED POSITION.  THE VEHICLE IS A 1994 DOLPHIN FROM NATIONAL RV ON A GM P-30 CHASSIS.  IT IS IN THE SHOP FOR REPAIRS NOW.  I UNDERSTAND THERE ARE A SUBSTANTIAL NUMBER OF FAILURES REPORTED REGARDING THIS SYSTEM.   *NLM
